channel.title: Fornasetti – Steven Chu – Photographer & Visual Experience Designer New York
channel.description: The culture of New York, shaped through photography, iconic brand development, and community building in nightlife.

item.title: Academy of the Frozen
item.dc:creator: Steven Chu
item.description: Photography by Steven Chu Styling by Cliff Hoppus at Artists by Timothy Priano Hair by Linh Nguyen […]
item.content:encoded:
Photography by Steven Chu
Styling by Cliff Hoppus at Artists by Timothy Priano
Hair by Linh Nguyen for PR at Partners
Makeup by Aeriel Payne using M.A.C. Cosmetics
Models Frey Mudd, Mikael Larsson & Evan Santoro @ Red Model Management, Marshall Brockley & Nick W @ Request Model Management NY, Thomas Hassler @ Fusion Models, Luca Schmitz @ New York Model Management
Special Thanks to Brian Kish Inc. New York for loan of Italian art pieces.
